insertRecord:
INSERT INTO sys_massage_course(title, content, lecturer, address, lecture_time, published_time, is_show, img_url)
VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
updateRecord:
UPDATE sys_massage_course
SET title = ?, content = ?, lecturer = ?, address = ?, lecture_time = ?,
published_time = ?, is_show = ?, img_url = ?
WHERE course_id = ?;
insertImages:
INSERT INTO sys_file(file_type, file_path, upload_time)
VALUES ?;
